text: Bahadur Singh Lama Tamang is a building contractor, Nepali politician and currently serving as member of the Bagmati Provincial Assembly. He is also leader of the Opposition in the Bagmati Provincial Assembly from Nepali Congress. He had previously served as the member of the House of Representatives of the federal parliament of Nepal, elected through the proportional representation system from Nepali Congress and member of the Development Committee of the House of Representatives. == References == Category:Nepalese people Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians Category:Tamang people
title: Bahadur Singh Lama
